name: qubit-simulator
description: A quantum computing simulator library for qubits and quantum gates

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:examples
scripts.test:examples: npm run example:basic && npm run example:circuit && npm run example:test
scripts.example:basic: npx tsc examples/basic-qubit.ts --outDir dist/examples --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 && node dist/examples/examples/basic-qubit.js
scripts.example:circuit: npx tsc examples/quantum-circuit.ts --outDir dist/examples --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 && node dist/examples/examples/quantum-circuit.js
scripts.example:test: npx tsc examples/test-functionality.ts --outDir dist/examples --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 && node dist/examples/examples/test-functionality.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test

author: Juan Felipe Reyes Sanchez
